trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the GridColumnStylesCollection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, si accede tramite classe GridColumnStylesCollection il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: The GridColumnStylesCollection uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: La classe GridColumnStylesCollection utilizza standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>metodi per modificare la raccolta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>per determinare se un particolare valore presente nella raccolta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>metodo per determinare l'indice di qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>oggetto all'interno della raccolta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the GridColumnStylesCollection before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Creare sempre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>oggetti che vengono aggiunti all'oggetto GridColumnStylesCollection prima di aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>oggetti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiunge un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>con un valore valido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valore alla raccolta, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>gli oggetti vengono generati automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the GridColumnStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, verrà generata un'eccezione se si tenta di aggiungere nuovi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>oggetti con duplicato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valori all'oggetto GridColumnStylesCollection.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Adds a column style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge uno stile di colonna alla raccolta.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of column style objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una matrice di oggetti di stile di colonna alla raccolta.

trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> oggetti da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.target: Cancella la raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The column header of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> can be set explicitly by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'intestazione di colonna di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>può essere impostata in modo esplicito impostando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> is set using uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>è impostato utilizza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The comparison between column headers and the value to look for is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Il confronto tra le intestazioni di colonna e il valore da cercare non è tra maiuscole e minuscole.

trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.
